title: Static multi-page perfume website with detailed types and reviews

requirements.text: Create a static 4–5 page website about perfumes (all types) with clear navigation between pages.

quotes:
About perfumes and all types 
Define a detailed and reviews,
Create a 4 to 5 pages
Creating a static website in html code

acceptanceCriteria: The site contains 4–5 distinct pages (separate routes/views) with working navigation links between them.
Each page renders without requiring any backend data or authentication to view content.

requirements.text: Add a Home page that introduces perfumes and explains how the site is organized (types, notes, concentration, and reviews).
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a short intro section and a concise table/section linking to the main pages (Types, Reviews, etc.).

requirements.text: Add a “Perfume Types & Guide” page with detailed explanations covering common fragrance families (e.g., floral, woody, oriental/amber, fresh/citrus, gourmand), note structure (top/middle/base), and concentration levels (EDT/EDP/Parfum/Cologne).
acceptanceCriteria: Types/Guide page includes detailed sections for at least 5 fragrance families, note pyramid explanation, and concentration level comparisons.

requirements.text: Add a “Reviews” page containing multiple detailed sample perfume reviews presented in a consistent format (overview, scent profile, longevity, sillage, season/occasion, pros/cons, rating).
acceptanceCriteria: Reviews page includes at least 6 reviews.
Each review displays the required fields (overview, scent profile, longevity, sillage, season/occasion, pros/cons, rating).

requirements.text: Add one additional page (either “Top Picks & Brands” or “About / Contact”) to reach a total of 4–5 pages, with detailed static content relevant to perfumes.
acceptanceCriteria: The site has a total of 4 or 5 pages.
The additional page contains substantive perfume-related content (not placeholder text).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, creative visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, layout) suitable for a premium perfume editorial website and use it consistently across all pages.

quotes: Creating a static website in html code

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent header/nav styling, typography scale, and spacing system.
Theme does not rely on default browser styles; it uses Tailwind-based styling throughout.

requirements.text: Generate and include required static images in the frontend public assets folder and render them in the UI (hero/headers and section accents) without routing images through the backend.

quotes: Creating a static website in html code

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
At least the hero image is displayed on the Home page and icons/accents are used on at least one other page.

constraints: Frontend must remain a static-content experience (no dependency on backend calls for page content).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or the immutable hook/bootstrap paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose those components instead if needed.
nonGoals: User accounts, Internet Identity login, or personalized user data.
Submitting reviews/comments or any server-stored content management.

required: Elegant perfume bottle hero banner on a marble vanity with soft warm lighting (perfume-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of 6 minimalist line icons related to fragrance notes (flower, citrus, wood, amber, vanilla, musk) on transparent background (note-icons.dim_512x512.png)
Abstract fragrance mist background texture with subtle gradients (fragrance-mist-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

preferencesToAdd: User wants a static website about perfumes (all types) with detailed descriptions and reviews across 4–5 pages.
